segments.text: Do you know how to play go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's easy . All you have to do is to use your pieces to surround the opponent's pieces and then take over all of his territory .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I heard it is very difficult to play .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's easier said than done . When you actually play , it can be very frustrating .
segments.speaker: S2
